languages.text: "Теперь ты видел{mf||а}, что у меня на душе. И знаешь мои истинные мысли и желания. Что же ты ответишь на них, {name}? Позволишь пройти с тобой путь длиною в жизнь?"
"Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"
languages.original_text: "Теперь ты видел{mf||а}, что у меня на душе. И знаешь мои истинные мысли и желания. Что же ты ответишь на них, {name}? Позволишь пройти с тобой путь длиною в жизнь?"

traits.locale_text: "Now you've seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"
"Now you've seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"
"Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"
"Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"
"Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

languages.text: “如今，你已经看到了我的灵魂，知晓了我真实的想法与愿望。{name}，你的答复是什么？你愿意与我共度这一生的旅程吗？”
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: “如今，你已经看到了我的灵魂，知晓了我真实的想法与愿望。{name}，你的答复是什么？你愿意与我共度这一生的旅程吗？”

languages.text: «Ahora ya has visto lo que hay dentro de mi alma. Ya conoces mis auténticos pensamientos y deseos. ¿Cuál es tu respuesta a ellos, {name}? ¿Querrás que camine por esta senda vital junto a ti?».
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: «Ahora ya has visto lo que hay dentro de mi alma. Ya conoces mis auténticos pensamientos y deseos. ¿Cuál es tu respuesta a ellos, {name}? ¿Querrás que camine por esta senda vital junto a ti?».

languages.text: « Vous avez vu ce qu'abrite mon âme. Vous connaissez désormais mes véritables pensées et désirs. Comment y répondrez-vous, {name} ? Accepterez-vous que j'arpente ce chemin à vos côtés ? »
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez vu ce qu'abrite mon âme. Vous connaissez désormais mes véritables pensées et désirs. Comment y répondrez-vous, {name} ? Accepterez-vous que j'arpente ce chemin à vos côtés ? »

languages.text: "Jetzt habt Ihr das Innere meiner Seele gesehen. Und Ihr kennt meine wahren Gedanken und Wünsche. Wie lautet Eure Antwort, {name}? Lasst Ihr mich diese lebenslange Straße zusammen mit Euch beschreiten?"
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt habt Ihr das Innere meiner Seele gesehen. Und Ihr kennt meine wahren Gedanken und Wünsche. Wie lautet Eure Antwort, {name}? Lasst Ihr mich diese lebenslange Straße zusammen mit Euch beschreiten?"

languages.text: 「今、あなたは私の魂の内面を見た。そして、私の本当の考えと願望を知った。{name}よ、あなたはそれらにどう答えるのだ？私と一緒にこの生涯続く道を歩んでくれるのか？」
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「今、あなたは私の魂の内面を見た。そして、私の本当の考えと願望を知った。{name}よ、あなたはそれらにどう答えるのだ？私と一緒にこの生涯続く道を歩んでくれるのか？」

languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, ? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

languages.text: "Artık ruhumun içini gördün. Gerçek düşüncelerimi ve arzularımı biliyorsun. Onlara nasıl tepki vereceksin {name}? Bu hayat yolunda seninle yürümeme izin verecek misin?"
languages.original_text: "Now you have seen what is inside my soul. And you know my true thoughts and desires. What will be your response to them, {name}? Will you let me walk this lifelong road with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Artık ruhumun içini gördün. Gerçek düşüncelerimi ve arzularımı biliyorsun. Onlara nasıl tepki vereceksin {name}? Bu hayat yolunda seninle yürümeme izin verecek misin?"
